short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to allow you to disable badges in chat for a cleaner experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple and easy to use chrome extension to clean up Twitch chat and remove repetitive badges of your choice.

-Simple and easy to navigate UI
-Unclutters chat
-Doesn't affect chat speed

No negatives!
